Policy: BCharity.xyz. (‚ÄúBCharity‚Äù or ‚Äúwe‚Äù) respects and protects the privacy of Users (‚Äúyou‚Äù or ‚Äúusers‚Äù). BCharity will collect and use your Personal Information, generated from your use of BCharity, in accordance with this Privacy Policy (‚ÄúPolicy‚Äù).
Information Collection1: We get information about you in a range of ways.
Information Collection2: Information you give us. Information we collect from you includes:
Information Collection4: Contact information, like username and email;
Information Collection5: Feedback and correspondence, such as information you provide in your responses to surveys, when you participate in market research activities, report a problem with Service, receive customer support or otherwise correspond with us;
Information Collection6: Usage information, such as information about how you interact with us, and it is anonymous;
Information Use: How we use the information we collect
Information Use1: Our primary purpose in collecting information is to to help us operate, provide, improve, customize, support, and market our services.
Information Use2: Provide the Services and customer support you request;
Updating Policy1: We reserves the right to update this Policy online from time to time, and the new policy will immediately replace the older one once posted.
Updating Policy2: We will notify you of material changes to this policy by updating the last updated date at the top of this page.
Updating Policy3: In particular, if you do not accept the revised policies, please immediately stop your use of BCharity.
Updating Policy4: Your continued use of our services confirms your acceptance of our Privacy Policy, as amended. If you do not agree to our Privacy Policy, as amended, you must stop using our Services. We recommend that you visit this page frequently to check for changes.
Contact Us Description: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please do not hesitate to contact us at

Don't have default: but you don't have a default account.
Name: Name
Pride switch: Turn this on to show your pride and turn the BCharity logo rainbow every day.
No default profile: You don't have any default profile set!
Select default profile description: Selecting your default account helps to display the selected profile across BCharity, you can change your default profile anytime.
What else1: Only the default profile will be visible across the BCharity, example notifications, follow etc.
What else2: You can change default profile anytime here.
Super follow description: Setting super follow makes users spend crypto to follow you, and it‚Äôs a good way to earn it, you can change the amount and currency or disable/enable it anytime.
Twitter cross post description: Reflect will auto-tweet new BCharity posts, so you can finally escape the bird site.
Allowance description: In order to use collect feature you need to allow the module you use, you can allow and revoke the module anytime.
Limited fee collect description: The Limited Fee Collect Module allows for anyfollower to collect the associated publication,provided they pay a fee, up to a specific limit of mints
Fee collect description: The Fee Collect Module allows for any follower to collect the associated publication provided they pay a fee set by the poster
Limited time fee collect description: The Limited Fee Collect Module allows for any follower to collect the associated publication, provided they pay a fee, up to a specific limit of mints.
Timed fee collect description: The Timed Fee Collect Module allows for any follower to collect the associated publication, provided they pay a fee, up to a specific time limit. The present whitelisted Timed Fee Collect module only has a 24-hour time limit to reduce gas usage and optimize efficiency.
Free collect description: The Free Collect Module allows any profile to collect the publication this module is attached to.
Revert collect description: The Revert Collect Module causes all collect actions on a given publication to fail, thus making the publication uncollectible.
Fee follow description: The Fee Follow Module only allows addresses to follow a given profile, so long as they pay a fee specified by the profile owner. Users can set the currency and amount required to be paid.
Follower only reference description: The Follower Only Reference Module ensures that only a profile is only allowed to mirror or comment on content.
Warning info: Please make sure that if you allow this module you will automatically be detected with the amount if you collect, fund and super follow.
Delete info: Deleting your account is permanent. All your data will be wiped out immediately and you won‚Äôt be able to get it back.
Delete info1: You cannot restore your BCharity account if it was accidentally or wrongfully deleted.
Delete info2: Some account information may still be available in search engines, such as Google or Bing.
Delete info3: Your @handle will be released immediately after deleting the account.
Delete confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete?

Hours Description: Submit hours to the BCharity network to earn rewards.
Activity TextArea: Tell us about your volunteer experience!
Accepting crypto title: An All-in-One Solution to Track Volunteer Hours
Accepting crypto subtitle: Tracking volunteer hours should be transparent, easy and impactful. B-Charity was built to make that possible.
Accepting crypto text2: B-Charity provides an easy to use system that allows for transparent, simple, and effective way to track volunteer hours.
Accepting crypto text3: Once connected, tracking volunteer hours can be accomplished in a few easy steps:
Accepting crypto text4: Register your organization by contacting B-Charity
Accepting crypto text5: B-Charity hosts fundraising campaigns and B-Charity receives DAI, a cryptocurrency
Accepting crypto text6: Partnered charities recieves Volunteer Tokens in the form of VHR and a portion of DAI
Accepting crypto text7: Charities can then host volunteer activities and send VHR to volunteers after completed service
Accepting crypto text8: VHR is then stored on the blockchain and organizations and volunteers can see their VHR at any time
Why choose title: Cryptocurrency is Going Mainstream. For Nonprofits, Too.
Why choose subtitle: Every nonprofit needs to know why cryptocurrency donations are the next big opportunity.
Why choose text2: Cryptocurrencies are on their way to achieving mainstream status. And believe it or not, but nonprofits like Save the Children led the way by being among the first institutions to accept Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Today, charitable organizations of all sizes are fundraising cryptocurrency, from one-person teams to international operations.
Why choose text3: Nonprofits that take cryptocurrency donations today will have the early-mover advantage on their peer organizations. That means greater access to a relatively young, affluent crypto donor base that is:
Why choose text4: Increasing its wealth via the growing crypto market cap, which hit an all-time-high of $3T in 2021
Why choose text5: Experiencing exponential user growth, similar to the wave of Internet adoption in the late 1990s
Why choose text6: Excited about using cryptocurrency and NFTs as a way to support their favorite causes
Why choose text7: More generous on average than their cash donor counterparts
Why choose text9: Bitcoin may be ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù but the recent rise of Ethereum and other altcoins has opened up a new world of possibilities for nonprofits.
Why choose text10: By accepting cryptocurrency donations with B-Charity, your nonprofit can take advantage of a variety of innovative fundraising techniques that are unique to the cryptocurrency and blockchain ecosystem, such as:
Why choose text14: Of course, you can continue to fundraise with testimonials and dollars-to-impact appeals that have been successful in the past. Just be ready to answer when crypto donors ask: what can one Bitcoin do to support your mission?
Support for organizations text: B-Charity provides and maintains the medium used to transfer volunteer hours
Support for organizations text2: If you have any questions or require assistance you can contact us at
Support for donors text: If you have any questions or require assistance you can contact us at
Resources info: Curious about Crypto, or want to expand your knowledge? Browse our articles on a variety of topics, from the basics of how to accept crypto donations as an organization to the types of causes crypto donors can support.
